extension.description: Please remember that NuMb3r5 is not an official part of the Kodi media player you are running, and therefore is not to be mentioned within official support channels of Kodi, this addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor itâ€™s intended use, it is simply a third party plugin which has been added to your system.
